name: Hunter (itch) (DoUFi)
description:
Raid all monster caves to complete the game. You can build your own base to protect yourself from the attacks of the monster which are coming for you in the night.
Controls:

[W, A, S, D] - Movement
[LMB] - Attack / Mine
[E] - Enter Dugeon (when in range)
[B] - Toggle Buildmenu
